items.title: Today is your last chance to secure a 30% discount on the new Anker Prime charging gear
items.summary:
This year at IFA, as you may have seen from our launch coverage, Anker debuted an entire slate of new Prime charging gear. That includes its new 300W Prime Power Bank, the 160W Prime wall charger, the 25W car charger, and the new 25W Qi2.2 Wireless Charging Station with a 3-in-1 setup. While the 14-in-1 Anker Prime Docking Station with onboard display that is already live at 25% off, today might be your last chance to secure the 30% discounts on the rest of it. It is unclear whether or not these deals will also be live on Amazon, or if the 30% discount will go live for anyone starting tomorrow, but it might not be worth taking a chance anyway considering all you have to do is drop your email down.

more…
